original_text: The Lord has lifted his hand up over the sea. He has made kingdoms shake with fear. He has given his command against Canaan, to destroy all its strong places.
korean_text: 여호와께서 바다 위에 그의 손을 펴사 열방을 흔드시며 여호와께서 가나안에 대하여 명령을 내려 그 견고한 성들을 무너뜨리게 하시고

sentences.original_text: The Lord has lifted his hand up over the sea
He has made kingdoms shake with fear
He has given his command against Canaan
to destroy all its strong places
